title: Handbook to Practical Disaster Preparedness for the Family, 2nd Edition
description: This handbook will help you to establish a practical disaster preparedness plan for your entire family. The 2ND EDITION has been expanded to include discussions of long-term food storage options, firearm selection and handling, disaster preparedness networks, radiological emergencies, our countryâ€™s impending financial collapse, and much more. Steps are also provided to help you prepare for the five deadliest types of natural earthquakes, tornadoes, hurricanes, floods, and tsunamis. This new larger 8" x 10" format includes easy-to-copy worksheets to help organize your family's preparedness plans. Additional information is presented for the elderly, those with children, people with disabilities, pregnant women, and pet owners. Every topic is well researched with over 280 references cited.
author: Arthur T. Bradley
